marklogic.body: Charlie Sheen is someone that I have absolutely no respect for. He has publicly badmouthed every single person that he's ever worked with or known. Directors, actors, producers, writers, ex-wives, girlfriends, former buddies - it doesn't matter, he's badmouths them. When he was on his "Torpedo" tour he even badmouthed Oliver Stone (who cast him in "Platoon" & "Wall Street") saying that his movies "suck". He looks like shit now and in that interview he was twitching as if he had a live wire up his ass. There was a time in Hollywood that if someone comported themselves like Sheen they would be shunned. He couldn't get a good network to broadcast his shitcom so he had to settle for F/X which basically shows re-runs and older movies. With all the bad karma he's brought on himself it would serve him right if this show crashes and Burns. The numbers should be good at first simply out of curiosity, but let's see where he's at by the end of the season...
